Welcome to "E-commerce Tutorials" by Seller's Choice!

Today, we're showing you How to Assign Category and Browse Terms to Your Amazon Listings. There are a lot of ways in searching products thru Amazon and one of this is going thru the categories. This is the reason why you need to label the category properly.

#ecommerce #AmazonSellerCentralTutorials #AmazonAssignBrowseTerms
